channel.title: Urgent help pi [solved]
channel.description: [code]I compiled my server as usual, got no errors, and then tried to run, and the runserver said this: [code=] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15 at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365) at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33) at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62) Could not find the main class: server.Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Urgent help pi [solved]
item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“Mill, post:3, topic:395903”][quote author=apathypvp link=topic=493089.msg3604892#msg3604892 date=1306009700]
That has happened to me a few times, my problem was that it wasen’t spaced properly apart or together. Check your code or the last thing you edited before compiling and running again and it might work for you if your lucky.
[/quote]
I solved it it was fine I editted npc.cfg incorrectly and used spaces rather than tabs![/quote]
always use tabs when editing shops npcs etc

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent help pi [solved]
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

apathypvp:

That has happened to me a few times, my problem was that it wasen’t spaced properly apart or together. Check your code or the last thing you edited before compiling and running again and it might work for you if your lucky.

I solved it it was fine I editted npc.cfg incorrectly and used spaces rather than tabs!

Read full topic

item.title: Urgent help pi [solved]
item.dc:creator: @Mill Mill
item.description:
@Mill wrote:

[code]I compiled my server as usual, got no errors, and then tried to run, and the runserver said this:

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
Caused by: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 15
        at server.world.ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:365)
        at server.world.ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:33)
        at server.Server.<clinit>(Server.java:62)
Could not find the main class: server.Server.  Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
